metadata.title: CVE-2023-52687 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Compliant (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: In the Linux kernel, the following vulnerability has been resolved:crypto: safexcel - Add error handling for dma_map_sg() callsMacro dma_map_sg() may return 0 on error. This patch enableschecks in case of the macro failure and ensures unmapping ofpreviously mapped buffers with dma_unmap_sg().Found by Linux Verification Center (linuxtesting.org) with staticanalysis tool SVACE.

criterions.comment: linux-fips package in fips-updates/xenial is affected and may need fixing.
